mapper.select: SELECT t1.id,t1.station_name,t1.ipaddr,t3.path,t1.positionId,ifnull(t2.v,'未配置位置') position,t1.alais,t1.n_point,t1.e_point,t1.type,t1.uid,x_point,y_point, start_adr,sys_info,chksum_len,chksum,s_ip,s_nm,s_gw,dns_ip,ser_ip,ser_port,dev_en,send_msg_time,rcv,dev_id,can1_baud_rate,can2_baud_rate, rs485_baud_rate,can1_mount_cnt,can2_mount_cnt,rs485_mount_cnt,rs485_led FROM t_substation t1 LEFT JOIN t_static t2 ON t1.positionId=t2.id LEFT JOIN t_static t3 ON t1.type=t3.id order by t1.ipaddr

update t_substation
station_name=#{station_name},
ipaddr=#{ipaddr},
n_point=#{n_point}, e_point=#{e_point},
positionId=#{positionId},
path=#{path},
x_point=#{x_point}, y_point=#{y_point},
alais=#{alais},
uid=#{uid},
start_adr=#{start_adr}, sys_info=#{sys_info}, chksum_len=#{chksum_len}, chksum=#{chksum}, s_ip=#{s_ip}, s_nm=#{s_nm}, s_gw=#{s_gw}, dns_ip=#{dns_ip}, ser_ip=#{ser_ip}, ser_port=#{ser_port}, dev_en=#{dev_en}, send_msg_time=#{send_msg_time}, rcv=#{rcv}, dev_id=#{dev_id}, can1_baud_rate=#{can1_baud_rate}, can2_baud_rate=#{can2_baud_rate}, rs485_baud_rate=#{rs485_baud_rate}, can1_mount_cnt=#{can1_mount_cnt}, can2_mount_cnt=#{can2_mount_cnt}, rs485_mount_cnt=#{rs485_mount_cnt}, rs485_led=#{rs485_led}
id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * from (SELECT station,sensorId,sensor_type FROM t_sensor WHERE control!=3 UNION ALL SELECT station,sensorId,sensor_type FROM t_switch_sensor WHERE control!=3 UNION ALL SELECT substation_id,cid,typeid FROM t_cardreder WHERE cstate!=3 UNION ALL SELECT stationId,radioId,type FROM t_radio WHERE `status` !=3 UNION ALL SELECT stationId,devid,type FROM t_equipment WHERE devid!=0) as s WHERE station=#{station} AND sensorId=#{sensorId} limit 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT station,sensorId FROM t_sensor WHERE control!=3 UNION ALL SELECT station,sensorId from t_switch_sensor WHERE control!=3 UNION ALL SELECT substation_id,cid FROM t_cardreder WHERE cstate!=3) as s WHERE station=#{station} GROUP BY station ORDER BY station

SELECT s.id as stationId,s.station_name,s.ipaddr,s.n_point AS station_n_point,s.e_point AS station_e_point,r.*, (SELECT st.v FROM t_static st WHERE st.id=r.sensor_position) AS position, (SELECT st.v FROM t_static st WHERE st.id=r.sensor_type) AS type, (SELECT st.k FROM t_static st WHERE st.id=r.sensor_type) AS sensorUnit FROM t_substation s LEFT JOIN t_sensor r ON r.station=s.id WHERE r.control!=3 and r.isDrainage!=1

SELECT sub.id stationid,sub.ipaddr ipaddr,sub.station_name,sub.n_point subn_point, sub.e_point sube_point,tss.id switchid,tss.station staid,sub.station_name station, sub.ipaddr ip,tss.sensorId,sub.path, tss.sensor_type,tsc.k type0x,tsc.v type,tss.control,tss.alarm_status,tss.power_status, tss.break_display,tcb.v break_d,tss.connect_display,tcc.v connect_d, tss.n_point,tss.e_point,tss.input_type,tss.sensor_position,tc.v position,tss.alais FROM t_substation sub LEFT JOIN t_switch_sensor tss ON tss.station=sub.id LEFT JOIN t_static tsc ON tss.sensor_type=tsc.id LEFT JOIN t_static tc ON tss.sensor_position=tc.id LEFT JOIN t_static tcb ON tss.break_display=tcb.id LEFT JOIN t_static tcc ON tss.connect_display=tcc.id where tss.control!=3

SELECT t.uid FROM (SELECT t1.uid,t1.sensorId,t2.ipaddr FROM t_sensor t1 LEFT JOIN t_substation t2 ON t1.station=t2.id WHERE t1.control!=3 UNION SELECT t3.uid,t3.sensorId,t4.ipaddr FROM t_switch_sensor t3 LEFT JOIN t_substation t4 ON t3.station=t4.id WHERE t3.control!=3) t WHERE t.sensorId=#{sensorId} AND t.ipaddr=#{ipaddr}
